alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 23 at 5:46PM MDT until October 25 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 4000 feet, from 3000 to 4000 feet 2 to 5 inches, and below 3000 feet up to an inch. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Backcountry enthusiasts and hunters should be prepared for wintry conditions and the potential for hypothermia if caught in a storm unprepared.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
